text: [Chapter 20a] [Xuir Plain, Central Nolavillia]

speaker: left
text: We'll be passing through the Nolavillian Mountain Range soon.

speaker: left
text: The path through the mountain range is very narrow, keep on guard for ambushes.

speaker: left
text: And it seems there's already a group of people ahead of us, likely trying to ambush us.

speaker: right
text: Hey, I recognize them!

speaker: left
text: You do?

speaker: right
text: Of course I do!

speaker: right
text: Those are Shadian soldiers. I think they're being led by Dael, the head knight of prince Neo's army.

speaker: left
text: But why would they be here though?

speaker: right
text: Who knows... We just need to pass by them, right?

speaker: left
text: Yes, I would prefer to avoid conflict.

speaker: left
text: Hey! Dael!

speaker: right
text: Hmm? What is this rat doing here?

speaker: left
text: Is it fine if we pass by your camp?

speaker: right
text: And why might you need to do that?

speaker: left
text: Prince Neo sent me here to retrieve Healia Aid, but I must entertain these Bipolians on their journey before they hand her over.

speaker: right
text: *sigh* Such a pathetic method for a pathetic fool.

speaker: right
text: As much as I hate you, I don't wish to disturb Prince Neo's plans.

speaker: right
text: Now run along with your circus, Elbon.
(Proton's army safely passes through Dael's camp)

speaker: left
text: Wow, that actually worked.

speaker: right
text: Of course it worked, I am the great Elbon Rich!

speaker: right
text: My power and fame are one to be feared!

speaker: left
text: It seemed to me more like it was Neo's power and fame that were feared, but I suppose you did get us pass safely.
???: AHHHHHHHH!!!

speaker: left
text: Huh, who was that?
???: Bandits! Bandits are up ahead!

speaker: left
text: Bandits?
???: They've chased me down the mountain range!
???: I am a mere merchant, I can't fight off a horde of bandits! Please help me!

speaker: right
text: If there's bandits ahead, we'll need to fight them to get past anyways.

speaker: left
text: You're right, prepare for battle!
[Box has joined your party]

speaker: left
text: That should be all of the bandits...
???: You there!

speaker: left
text: Huh? Is someone there? (Why does this keep happening...)
???: You hold great power, Proton.

speaker: left
text: Who are you?
???: I am Neville of the OS, also known as NOTOS.

speaker: right
text: I came here after I sensed great power, and you have great potential within your abilities

speaker: right
text: I wish to witness more of your battles, its not everyday that I find someone like you.

speaker: right
text: And don't worry, I've already added myself to your party.
[Xuirist Cavern]

speaker: left
text: Preperations are now complete.

speaker: right
text: Good.

speaker: right
text: We'll kill every last one of them fools.

speaker: right
text: Those who oppose lord Prime shall no longer live...

speaker: right
text: And the Holy Itucher shall finally become ours!

speaker: right
text: And one more thing...

speaker: right
text: *They* must partake in the battle.

speaker: right
text: No excuses. Either they partake or I'll destroy them myself.

speaker: right
text: Which would you rather want, Omega?
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: The Holy Itucher, the ultimate weapon...

speaker: left
text: How much destruction do you think it's caused?

speaker: left
text: Why has no one destroyed it, is it indestructable?

speaker: left
text: Proton, if you obtain the Holy Itucher...

speaker: left
text: I can only hope that you destroy it.

speaker: left
text: The wars and battles fought over the weapon must be stopped, and that reponsibility will soon fall upon you.
[Yranecrem and Proton leveled up!]
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: Hey kid, what're we even fightin' for?

speaker: right
text: What do you mean?

speaker: left
text: Therr army, what's our goal?

speaker: right
text: I think we're trying to attack the Shadow Realm to retrieve the Holy Itucher.

speaker: left
text: Oooooooh noooooooooo...

speaker: left
text: I might be regrettin' joinin'...
[Dliug and Wodahs up!]
